definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
think again and again before acting (idiom); consider carefully in advance

place sb on a field of death and he will fight to live (idiom based on Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to fight desperately when confronting mortal danger/fig. to find a way out of an impasse
pinyin: zhi4 zhi1 si3 di4 er2 hou4 sheng1

definition: until death puts an end (idiom); one's whole life/unto one's dying day
to bend to a task and spare no effort unto one's dying day (idiom); striving to the utmost one's whole life/with every breath in one's body, unto one's dying day
pinyin: ju1 gong1 jin4 cui4 , si3 er2 hou4 yi3

sentences.english: Then he put a poison arrow in his bow and shot it straight at the monster.
sentences.chinese: 而后王子将毒箭放在弓上，对直朝怪物射去。

sentences.english: The torchlight swung across the little beach and out over the water, searching.
sentences.chinese: 手电筒的光在小海滩上扫过，而后照向水面搜索着。

sentences.english: And  then  be  a  simple  man.
This radiation, in its turn is absorbed and reemitted.
sentences.chinese: 这新的射线再次被吸收，而后释放。

sentences.english: Everything from the Tao to grow, and then return to the road.
sentences.chinese: 万物由道而生，循着道成长，而后又回归于道。

sentences.english: Owners decide hourly rental rate and the companies cover the insurance.
sentences.chinese: 车主可以随时定出租金率而后由公司来购买保险。

sentences.english: Think twice even when there is only one negative reference.
sentences.chinese: 即便只有一个负面的意见，你也要三思而后行。

sentences.english: The ancients cloud "doom to death and then".
sentences.chinese: 古人云“置之死地而后生”。

sentences.english: Half an hour after she woke up and began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 半小时后她醒过来而后开始哭了。

sentences.english: To commit no sin is better than retribution and renunciation of sin.
sentences.chinese: 与其得了恶报而后脱离恶道，不如不去犯罪。

sentences.english: The fungi then grow in shoes, especially tight ones without air circulation.
sentences.chinese: 而后真菌可在鞋中生长，特别是不透气的密实的鞋子。

sentences.english: He then worked as a mechanic on Italian motorcycles.
sentences.chinese: 而后他在意大利的摩托车机修厂做技工。

sentences.english: Betty shook off her surprise and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂先是一怔，而后笑了起来。

sentences.english: With the emergency of Foucault's post-modern philosophy, traditional philosophy was buried thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 而后现代福柯的出现，则彻底埋葬了传统哲学。

sentences.english: Yes, fights and then, art of war it often, wonderful application, all a heart.
sentences.chinese: 是的，阵而后战，兵法之常，运用之妙，全乎一心。

definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to turn to (sth else)/to switch to
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to take advantage/to seize an opportunity/in passing/without taking extra trouble/conveniently
